FuncDef: This command displays information on the IGMP snooping port database for the VPLS service.

ParaDef.Info: Displays the IGMP snooping port database for a specific multicast group address.
Displays the IGMP snooping port database for a specific SAP.
Displays only IGMP snooping entries associated with the specified mesh SDP or spoke SDP. For a spoke SDP, the VC ID must be specified; for a mesh SDP, the VC ID is optional. Values-1 to 17407.
The virtual circuit ID on the SDP ID for which to display information. Values-1 to 4294967295. ParamDefault: Default- For mesh SDPs only, all VC IDs
Displays IGMP snooping statistics matching the specified group address.
Displays IGMP snooping statistics matching one particular source within the multicast group.
